scripts.postinstall: cd ts-force && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ts-force-gen && npm install
scripts.test: cd ts-force && npm test && cd ../ts-force-gen && npm test
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Code should be published from individual directories' && exit 1
scripts.publishRuntime: cd ts-force && npm version $npm_package_config_version && npm publish
scripts.publishGen: cd ts-force-gen && npm version $npm_package_config_version && npm publish
scripts.publishBoth: npm run publishRuntime && npm run publishGen
